datafield.subfield: proceedings of the International Conference EITI 2014, Shenzhen, China, 16-17 August 2014 /
editors, Young Min Song, Pusan National University, Busan, Korea; Kyung Sup Kwak, Inha University, Incheon, Korea.

research of mobile platforms -- Optimization of HF-SCF on CPU-GPU hybrid parallel computing infrastructure -- Next generation malware analysis techniques and tools -- Research and implementation of index system, taking Gongqing digital eco-city as an example -- Research on digital forensics and its relevant problems -- Synchronization of fractional-order chaotic systems using adaptive linear allowing fundamental switching frequency.
